text: Metro Surabaya Commuter Line operates in Surabaya Metropolitan area such as Gresik, Bangkalan, Mojokerto, Surabaya, Sidoarjo and Lamongan. ==Trains and Route== ===Short-range trains=== * Susi Commuter DMU: Surabaya/Kota - Porong vv. (make a stop in each station). * Sulam Commuter DMU: Surabaya/Pasar Turi - Lamongan vv. (make a stop in each station). * Jenggala DMU: Mojokerto - Sidoarjo vv. (make a stop in each station). * KA Lokal Bojonegoro DMU: Bojonegoro - Sidoarjo vv. (make a stop in each station). ===Medium-range trains=== * Kertosono Local Train: Surabaya/Kota - Kertosono vv. (make a stop in each station exc. Ngagel). ==External links== * Jadwal KRD Kertosono 2015 * * * Category:Passenger rail transport in Indonesia Category:Surabaya Category:East Java Category:Transport in Java East Java
title: Commuter rail in Surabaya
